locations.title: Golden Seed tree after using a Stonesword Key and ascending Dragon Temple Lift, past a plaza fountain
Golden Seed tree guarded by four eagles. Near low health dragon
Boltdrake Talisman +2
locations.description: At the end of a long path dropping down to the left of the low-health dragon

locations.title: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2
locations.description: Hidden on some floating rubble underneath other rubble right before the building with the Crucible Knight

locations.title: Old Lord's Talisman
locations.description: In a chest at the end of the path, down the Great Bridge in the opposite direction from Maliketh
